snippet: In the first test of a Republican promise to reject all Obama appointments, only six G.O.P. senators voted against the confirmation of a nominee for federal judge.
abstract: In the first test of a Republican promise to reject all Obama appointments, only six G.O.P. senators voted against the confirmation of a nominee for federal judge.
lead_paragraph: The "heck no" caucus in the Senate fizzled in its first test.

headline.main: Republican Vow of Revenge Falls Short
